40027019	Pilato viyakalile mwiichigoda cha nhaguso, mke wake kamgalila usenga, “Sekeuwe na mbuli yoyose na iyo munhu mwene unovu, kwaviya chilo chifosile nigazigwa ng'hani muzinzozi kwa ichimu chake.”
40027020	Mbali wakulu wa nhambiko na walala walangulizi wa bumbila da wahuwila wa Chilisito, wawasongeza lung'husesa, wamulonde Balaba na kumkoma Yesu.
40027021	Mbali Pilato kaluuza lung'husesa, “Yelihi mwa wano waidi molonda nimulekeleleni?” Wamwidika, “Balaba!”
40027022	Pilato kawauza, “Maabaho Yesu yotangigwa Chilisito nimtende choni?” Wamwidika, “Muwambe mumsalaba!”
40027023	Mbali Pilato kawauza, “Katenda ilihi ihile?” Mbali wawo waiyoha kulandula madizi yawo, “Muwambe mumsalaba!”
40027024	Pilato viyawonile kuwa haifaya chochose ila tibwilitibwili jandusa, kasola mazi kanawa makono yake haulongozi ha lung'husesa, kalonga, “Niye nabule kwihiligwa kwa damu ya munhu ino! Ivo manye wenyewo!”
40027025	Lung'husesa lose wedika, “Damu yake iwe mchanyha yetu na mchanyha ya wanetu!”
40027026	Maabaho Pilato kamfungulila Balaba, kalagiliza Yesu yalanhigwe mibalati, maabaho kamulava yawambigwe mumsalaba.
40027027	Maabaho wakalizi wa Pilato wamwingiza Yesu muna ichiheleto cha mtawala, waiting'hana chibumbila chose.
40027028	Wamvula viwalo vake na wamuyawaza chiwalo chidung'hu.
40027029	Wabota kombelo da miwa na wadika mchanyha ya ditwi jake na balati kuna umkono wake wa kulume, wanzeha na wamtowa mang'huwa haulongozi wake, walonga, “Ndamsa Mfalume wa Wayahudi!”
40027030	Maabaho wamtemela mate, wasola diya dibalati na wamtowa najo muna iditwi.
40027031	Viwakomeleze kumzeha, wadivula walo diya na wamuyawaza viwalo vake mwenyewo. Maabaho wangala yawambigwe mumsalaba.
40027032	Viwakalile wolawa, waiting'hana na munhu kulawa Chilene Saimoni, na wakalizi wamuwangiliza yausole msalaba wa Yesu.
40027033	Wafika hanhu hatangigwe Goligota, fambulo jake “Bombwe da Ditwi”.
40027034	Uko wamwing'ha Yesu divai itibwilizigwe na chinhu cha usungu, mbali Yesu viyalanzile kalema kung'wa.
40027035	Wamuwamba mumsalaba na maabaho waigolela viwalo vake kwa kuvitowela mhiya.
40027036	Viwakomeleze kutenda ivo wakala hasi kuno womkaliza.
40027037	Hachanyha ya ditwi jake wandika vino, “Ino iyo Yesu, Mfalume wa Wayahudi.”
40027038	Maabaho wabananzi waidi wakala wawambigwa mumsalaba hamwe na Yesu, imwe ubanzi wake wa kulume na imwenga ubanzi wake wa kumoso.
40027039	Wanhu wakalile wofosa hanhu baho wamuliga Yesu kuno wotingisa matwi yawo kwa kunzeha,
40027040	wolonga, “Weye mwene kuibomola Kaye ya Mulungu na kuizenga kaidi kwa siku nhatu! Ikombole mwenyewo, one uhawa Mwana wa Mulungu, humuluka mumsalaba!”
40027041	Ivo ivo na wafundiza Malagilizo na wakulu wa nhambiko na walala walangulizi wamkeweza, walonga,
40027042	“Kawakombola wamwenga, mbali kuikombola mwenyewo hadaha bule! Vino yeye siyo Mfalume wa Isilaeli! One yahahulumuka mumsalaba, chizamuhuwila!
40027043	Komuhuwila Mulungu na kalonga, ‘Niye ni Mwana wa Mulungu.’ Mbali leka chilole one Mulungu komulonda!”
40027044	Hata waja wabananzi wowakalile wawambigwa hamwe nayo wamkeweza ivo ivo.
40027045	Kulawa saa sita mbaka saa kenda, isi yose igubikigwa na ziza.
40027046	Na zuwa da kenda Yesu kalandula dizi jake kalila kwa nguvu kalonga, “Heloi heloi Lama saba chitani?” Fambulo jake, “Mulungu wangu, Mulungu wangu, habali kunileka?”
40027047	Wanhu wamwenga wemile haja wamuhulika na walonga, “Komtanga Eliya.”
40027048	Bahobaho imwe wawo kakimbila, kasola dodoki, kadivabika muna idivai igwaduke, maabaho kadika muna ulumango na kamwing'ha Yesu yang'we.
40027049	Mbali wamwenga walonga, “Leka chilole fana Eliya kezakwiza kumkombola!”
40027050	Yesu viyalongile kaidi kwa dizi kulu, kadanganika.
40027051	Bahobaho panziya da Kaye ya Mulungu ditulika vihande vidi kulawa uchanyha mbaka hasi, isi igudemeka na miluwe itulika.
40027052	Maleme yagubuka na ng'huli za wanhu welile wowagonile zizilibuka.
40027053	Wasegela muna yamaleme, na hamwande Yesu viyazilibuke, wengila kuna dibululu jelile, uko wanhu wengi wawawona.
40027054	Mkulu wa wakalizi na waja wakalile hamwe nayo womkaliza Yesu, viwadiwone gudemeko da isi na mbuli zozitendeke, wadumba ng'hani, walonga, “Kweli ino kakala Mwana wa Mulungu!”
40027055	Haja hakala na wanaake wengi wolola kwa kutali, wawo wowamsondelele Yesu kulawa mkowa wa Galilaya na kumtaza.
40027056	Viwakalile, kakala umo Maliya Magidalena, na Maliya mami yake Yakobo na Yosefu, na mke wa Zebedayo.
40027057	Viifikile ichigulogulo keza munhu tajili wa Alimasaya, zina jake Yosefu, nayo kakala mwanahina wa Yesu.
40027058	Kahita kwa Pilato na kumpula lukuli lwa Yesu. Baho Pilato kalagiliza yeng'higwe.
40027059	Ivo Yosefu kauhulumusa lukuli lwa Yesu na kauzingiliza muna ichikanda chizelu cha sambi,
40027060	kawika muna dileme da sambi dodikalile hana ihanhu hake ha kuwandila doyakalile kadisongola muna uluwe, keka dibwe kulu haumulomo wa dileme, maabaho kasegela.
40027061	Maliya Magidalena na Maliya ija wekaidi wakala habehi na dileme.
40027062	Na siku isondelele, dikala Isiku ya Mhumulo, wakulu wa nhambiko na Mafalisayo waiting'hana na Pilato,
40027063	walonga, “Mwenevale, chokumbuka kuwa viyakalile ngima kalonga, ‘Zahafosa siku nhatu nizazilibuka.’
40027064	Ivo ulagilize leme jake dikalizigwe goya mbaka muna isiku ya tatu. Muladi wanahina wake sekewadahe kuhita na kuubawa lukuli lwake na kuwalongela wanhu kuwa kazilibuka. Uvwizi wa uhelelo wizaufosa uja wa mwanduso.”
40027065	Pilato kawalongela, “Soleni wakalizi, hiteni muhakikishe kuwa leme dokalizigwa fana vomulonda.”
40027066	Ivo wasegela wahita kudikaliza dileme kwa kwika chilaguso muna idibwe.
40028001	Viimalile Isiku ya Mhumulo, siku ya mwanduso ya juma, vikukunguzuke, Maliya Magidalena na Maliya ija wekaidi, wahita kudilola dileme.
40028002	Bahobaho kulawilila gudemeko kulu da isi, kwaviya msenga wa kuulanga kahulumuka kadibimbilisa dibwe diya na kadikalila.
40028003	Na chihanga chake chikala fana lumwemwe, na mawalo yake yakala mazelu chwee!
40028004	Wakalizi wazanywa ng'hani, wagudemeka wawa fana wanhu wadanganike.
40028005	Msenga wa kuulanga kawalongela wanaake waja, “Sekemwanywe, kwaviya novimanya kuwa monzahila Yesu yoyawambigwe mumsalaba.
40028006	Hano kahabule, kazilibuka fana viyalongile. Izoni muhalole hanhu hoyagonizigwe.
40028007	Lelo hiteni himahima, na mukawalongele wanahina wake vino, ‘Yesu kazilibuka, nayo kezamulongolelani kuhita mkowa wa Galilaya, uko mwizamuwona!’ Kumbukeni viya viyamulongeleni.”
40028008	Ivo wanaake waja wasegela kudileme himahima, kwa kudumba na deng'ho kulu, na wakimbila kuwalongela wanahina wake.
40028009	Bahobaho Yesu kaiting'hana nawo, kawalongela, “Kaleni kwa tindiwalo.” Wamkwenhukila, wamwamha magulu yake na wamtambikila.
40028010	Maabaho Yesu kawalongela, “Sekemudumbe. Hiteni mukawalongela ndugu zangu wahite mkowa wa Galilaya, uko wezaniwona.”
40028011	Wanaake vikalile wang'hali mwi inzila wohita, wakalizi wamwenga wahita kuna dibululu na kuwalongela wakulu wa nhambiko chila chinhu chilawilile.
40028012	Wakulu wa nhambiko viwaiting'hane na walala wapanga mbuli zawo, waweng'ha sente nyingi waja iwakalizi
40028013	na wawalongela, “Longeni kuwa ichilo vichikalile chigona nhongo wanahina wake weza na wabawa lukuli lwa Yesu.”
40028014	One mtawala yahahulika mbuli ino, cheye chizalonga nayo, na mweye hamwizadumba bule.
40028015	Wakalizi wazisola hela ziya watenda fana viwafunzigwe. Na mbuli iyo yenela kwa Wayahudi mbaka diyelo.
40028016	Maabaho wanahina longo na imwe wahita mkowa wa Galilaya kuna ulugongo, uko Yesu kuyawalongele wahite.
40028017	Na viwamuwone, wamtumbalila mavindi, mbali wamwenga wakala wodumba.
40028018	Yesu kawakwenhukila habehi na kawalongela, “Ning'higwa udaho wose kuulanga na mwi isi.
40028019	Ivo hiteni kwa wanhu wa zisi zose mukawatende wawe wanahina wangu, na muwabatize kwa zina da Tata na Mwana na Muhe Yelile,
40028020	na muwafundize kuyamha yose yonimulongeleni mweye. Na niye nizakuwa hamwe na mweye siku zose mbaka kuuhelelo wa isi.”
41001001	Mwanduso wa Mbuli Inogile ya Yesu Chilisito, Mwana wa Mulungu.
41001002	Fana viyandikile mulotezi wa Mulungu Isaya, “Mulungu kalonga, ‘Nizamtuma msang'hani wangu kuulongozi wako, iyo kezaitanda nzila yako.’
41001003	Dizi da munhu dotanga muichuwala, ‘Muitande nzila ya Mndewa, muhagolose hanhu honda yafose.’ ”
41001004	Ivo Yohana kalawilila muichuwala, kopetela na kobatiza. Kawalongela wanhu, “Lekeni uhasanyi wenu na mubatizigwe, na Mulungu kezawasegezela uhasanyi wenu.”
41001005	Wanhu wengi walawa mwiisi ya Yudeya na bululu da Yelusalemu wahita kumtegeleza Yohana. Watogola kuleka uhasanyi wawo, na Yohana kawabatiza mu ulwanda wa Yolodani.
41001006	Yohana kayawala chiwalo chitendigwe kwa mazoya ya ngamiya na mkwiji wa mbende mchigudi chake, na kakala koja nzige na uki wa mwiimbago.
41001007	Kawapetela, “Kuchisogo changu kezakwiza munhu yeli mkulu kufosa niye. Niye sifaya hata kwiinama na kufungula nzabi za vilatu vake.
41001008	Niye nowabatiza kwa mazi, mbali yeye kezawabatiza kwa Muhe Yelile.”
41001009	Siku izo, Yesu keza kulawa mudibululu da Nazaleti, mwiisi ya Galilaya, na kabatizigwa na Yohana muna ulwanda wa Yolodani.
41001010	Bahobaho viyalawile muna yamazi, kawona kuulanga kuvuguka na Muhe wa Mulungu kamuhulumukila fana nziwa.
41001011	Na dizi dihulikigwa kulawa kuulanga, “Weye niyo mwanangu nyachende wangu, ninogiligwe na weye.”
41001012	Bahobaho Muhe wa Mulungu kamulongoza Yesu mbaka kuna ichuwala,
41001013	na kakala uko kwa siku malongo mane kogezigwa na Lufyende. Na wanyama wa muna imbago wakala haja, mbali Wasenga wa Kuulanga wa Mndewa weza na kumsang'hanila.
41001014	Yohana vayekigwe mwiichifungo, Yesu kahita kuna umkowa wa Galilaya kuwapetela wanhu Mbuli Inogile ya Mulungu.
41001015	Kalonga, “Lusita lufika, Ufalume wa Mulungu wa habehi. Lekeni uhasanyi wenu na kuitogola Mbuli Inogile!.”
41001016	Yesu viyakalile yofosa mumgwazogwazo mwa dilamba da Galilaya, kawaona wavula waidi, Saimoni na Andeleya ndugu yake. Wakala wovula somba kwa lwavu.
41001017	Yesu kawalongela, “Nisondeleleni, na niye nizawafundizani kuwavuwa wanhu.”
41001018	Bahobaho wazileka nyavu zawo na wamsondelela.
41001019	Viyagendelele haulongozi chidogo, kawaona Yakobo na Yohana, wana wa Zebedayo. Wakala mwiingalawa, wozitenda goya nyavu zawo.
41001020	Bahobaho Yesu viyawaonile, kawatanga. Na wawo wamuleka Zebedayo tati yawo hamwe na wanhu wa kusang'hana mwiingalawa, wamsondelela.
41001021	Yesu na wanahina wake wahita mudibululu da Kapelinaumu. Isiku ya Mhumulo viifikile, Yesu kengila mwii Kaye ya kutosela, kandusa kufundiza.
41001022	Wanhu wamtegeleze wazanywa ng'hani kwa mafundizo yake, kwaviya hafundize fana wafundiza Malagilizo, mbali kakala yofundiza fana munhu yana udaho.
41001023	Bahobaho munhu yoyakalile na chinyamkela kengila mwii kaye ya kutosela na kaguta kwa dizi kulu,
41001024	“Kolonda uchitende choni, weye Yesu wa Nazaleti? Vino kwiza kuchikomeleza? Nokumanya weye iyo Yelile wa Mulungu!”
41001025	Yesu kambwakila chinyamkela ija, “Nyamala! Lawa kwa munhu ino!”
41001026	Chinyamkela kangela chisango munhu ija, kalila kwa dizi kulu, na kumulawa.
41001027	Wanhu wazanywa ng'hani na waiuza wenyewo, “Chinhu gani chino? Yano mafundizo ya sambi? Munhu ino kana udaha wa kulava vinyamkela, nawo womuhulika!”
41001028	Na ivo mbuli za Yesu zenela himahima chila hanhu mwiisi ya Galilaya.
41001029	Bahobaho viwalawile mwii Kaye ya kutosela, Yesu hamwe na Yakobo na Yohana wahita kwikaye kwa Saimoni na Andeleya.
41001030	Mkoi wa Saimoni kakala yagonile mudikomwa, kolumwa. Bahobaho Yesu viyafikile wamulongela mbuli za mtamu iyo.
41001031	Kamuhitila, kamwamha mkono na kumwinula. Utamu umulawa, naye kandusa kuwasang'hanila.
41001032	Ichigulogulo vichifikile, wanhu wamgalila Yesu watamu wawo na wose wowakalile na vinyamkela.
41001033	Na wanhu wose wa dibululu waiting'hana hana ulwivi lwa ikaye.
41001034	Na Yesu kawahonya wanhu wengi wowakalile na mitamu mbasakanyo. Viya viya kawalava vinyamkela wengi, na haweng'hile nyafasi ya kulonga kwaviya wammanya yeye yalihi.
41001035	Siku isondelele imitootondo ng'hani, Yesu kalamka na kusegela ukaye. Kalawa hanze mudibululu, kahita hanhu halibule wanhu, uko katosa.
41001036	Mbali Saimoni na iwayage wahita kumulonda.
41001037	Na vawamuwonile, wamulongela, “Wanhu wose wokuzahila weye.”
41001038	Mbali Yesu kawalongela, “Chihite mwii vibululu vimwenga vili mmabehi na hano. Uko nako nolondeka kuwapetela wanhu Mbuli Inogile, kwaviya icho niicho chinizile.”
41001039	Ivo Yesu kahita chila hanhu mwiisi ya Galilaya, kawapetela wanhu Mbuli Inogile muna zikaye za kutosela na kuwinga vinyamkela.
41001040	Munhu imwe yeli na dikulu kamwizila, kumtumbalila mavindi na kumpula. Kalonga, “Wahalonda, kwodaha kunihonya.”
41001041	Yesu kamuwonela ubazi, kaugolosa umkono wake, kamdalisa na kumulongela, “Nolonda kukutaza, hona!”
41001042	Na bahobaho dikulu dilawa, kahona.
41001043	Yesu kamulongela yahite na kumgomesa ng'hani,
41001044	“Tegeleza, sekeumulongele munhu yoyose mbuli ino, mbali wite ukailaguse kwa mulava nhambiko. Maabaho, kalave nhosa fana Musa vayalagilize kwa kuhona kwako, muladi kuwalagusa wanhu wose kuwa kuhona.”
41001045	Mbali munhu iyo kalawa, kandusa kuwapetela wanhu mbuli izo, mbaka Yesu hadahile kwingila mudibululu kwa uwazi. Ivo, kakala kunze, hanhu halibule wanhu. Hata ivo wanhu wamuhitila kulawa chila hanhu.
41002001	Vizifosile siku chidogo, Yesu kabwela kaidi Kapelinaumu, na wanhu wahulika kuwa ka ukaye.
41002002	Wanhu wengi waiting'hana hamwe mbaka kukala habule hanhu hasigale hana ulwivi, wamema mbaka haluhelengo. Yesu kakala kowapetela mbuli.
41002003	Weza wanhu wane, wampapa munhu yahololile, wamgala kwa Yesu.
41002004	Kwa chimu kukala na wanhu wengi, hawadahile kuwa habehi na Yesu. Ivo watobola kuchisuwili, kulinga haja hayakalile Yesu. Baho, wamuhulumusa munhu ija yahololile muidilili.
41002005	Yesu viyawonile uhuwilo wawo, kamulongela munhu ija yahololile, “Mwanangu, kusegezigwa uhasanyi wako.”
41002006	Wafundiza Malagilizo wamwenga wakalile baho wandusa kuyiuza wenyewo,
41002007	“Hambwe vino ni chinhu chilihi chochimtenda yalonge ivo? Ino komuliga Mulugu! Mulungu yaidumwe yodaha kusegeza uhasanyi!”
41002008	Bahobaho Yesu kavimanya yaja yawakalile wogesa mwi imyoyo yawo. Ivo kawalongela, “Habali mwogesa ivo mwi imizoyo yenu?
41002009	Dilihi dibuhile, kumulongela munhu yahololile, ‘Uhasanyi wako usegezigwa, hebu kulonga, inuka, papa dilili jako wite’?
41002010	Mbali muvimanye vino, Mwana wa Munhu kana udaho wa kusegeza uhasanyi mwiisi.” Maabaho kamulongela munhu yahololile,
41002011	“Nokulongela, inuka, upape lili jako na wite ukaye!”
41002012	Nayo kenuka, kapapa lili jake na kulawa kunze wanhu wose womulola. Wose wazanywa na wamtunhiza Mulungu, walonga, “Hachina chiwona chinhu chino!”
41002013	Yesu kahita kaidi mumgwazogwazo wa bahali. Lung'husesa lukulu lwa wanhu lumwizila, naye kandusa kuwafundiza.
41002014	Viyakalile kofosa, kamuwona Lawi, mwanage Alufayo kakala mwii kaye ya kulihila kodi. Yesu kamulongela, “Nisondelele.” Lawi kenuka na kumsondelela.
41002015	Yesu viyakalile yoja ndiya mwiikaye ya Lawi, wasola kodi wengi na “weli na uhasanyi” wakala hamwe nayo na wanahina wake, kwaviya wanhu wengi wakala womsondelela.
41002016	Wafundiza Malagilzo wamwenga wakalile Mafalisayo viwamuwonile koja na “weli na uhasanyi” na wasola kodi, wawauza wanahina wake, “Habali koja na wanhu fana wano?”
41002017	Yesu viyawahulike, kawedika, “Wanhu wagima hawamulonda mganga mbali watamu womulonda. Sizile kuwatanga wanhu wanogile, mbali weli na uhasanyi.”
41002018	Wanahina wa Yohana Mbatizi na wanahina wa Mafalisayo wakala wofunga kuja. Wanhu wamwenga wamwitila Yesu na kumuuza, “Habali wanahina wa Yohana na wanahina wa Mafalisayo wofunga kuja, mbali wanahina wako hawafunga kuja?”
41002019	Yesu kawedika, “Vino wanhu wagonekigwe kudidugila da kusola wodaha kufunga kuja chipindi munhu yoyosola kahamwe nawo? Hawadaha kufunga kuja.
41002020	Mbali chipindi chizakwiza munhu yoyosola vondayasegezigwe kumwawo. Baho wezafunga kuja.
41002021	“Habule munhu yoyokanha chikupo cha walo da sambi na kuchika mwii chiwalo cha umwaka. Kwaviya yahatenda ivo, chikupo cha sambi chizachibananga chiwalo cha umwaka, na hanhu hadegeke hezakongezekela.
41002022	Na habule munhu yoguma divai ya sambi mwii mifuko ya mbende ya umwaka. Kwaviya yahatenda ivo, divai ya sambi izaitula mbende, na divai izakwitika na mifuko izabanangika. Mbali divai ya sambi igumigwa mwii mbende ya sambi.”
41002023	Siku dimwe ya Mhumulo, Yesu hamwe na wanahina wake wakala wofosa muna imigunda ya uhemba. Viwakalile wofosa, wanahina wake wandusa kuhulula uhemba.
41002024	Mafalisayo wamulongela, “Lola! Habali wanahina wako wotenda chinhu hachilondeka kutendigwa mwii Isiku ya Mhumulo?”
41002025	Yesu kawedika, “Hamusomile chiya Daudi chayatendile na wayage vawakalile na nzala?
41002026	Muna siku za mkulu wa nhambiko Abiyasali, Daudi kengila mwii Kaye ya Mulungu na kuyaja yamagate yoyalavigwe kwa Mulungu. Yamagate yayo yalondeka kudigwa na walava nhambiko muhala. Mbali Daudi kayaja na maabaho kaweng'ha wayage.”
41002027	Maabaho Yesu kawalongela, “Isiku ya Mhumulo ikigwa kwa wanhu, na siyo wanhu kwa Isiku ya Kuhumula.
41002028	Mwana wa Munhu niyo Mndewa wa Isiku ya Mhumulo.”
41003001	Yesu kengila kaidi mwii Kaye ya Kutosela. Baho kukala na munhu yahololile mkono.
41003002	Wanhu wamwenga wakala wolonda chimu cha kumgwila Yesu. Ivo wamulola fana kezamuhonya mwii Isiku ya Mhumulo.
41003003	Yesu kamulongela munhu yahololile mkono, “Izo hano haulongozi.”
41003004	Maabaho Yesu kawauza wanhu waja, “Chilihi chinogile kutendigwa muna Isiku ya Mhumulo, kutenda yanogile hebu kutenda yehile? Kuukombola ugima wa munhu hebu kuukoma?” Mbali hawalongile chinhu.
41003005	Yesu kawalola waja wanhu kwa ludoko, na kawona usungu muumoyo wake kwa chimu cha udala wa mizoyo yawo. Maabaho kamulongela munhu yahololile, “Golosa umkono wako.” Nayo kaugolosa, bahobaho umkono wake uhona.
41003006	Maabaho Mafalisayo walawa kunze ya kaye ya Mulungu, waiting'hana na wanhu wa chigwena cha Helode, na wandusa kulonda nzila ya kumkoma Yesu.
41003007	Yesu na wanahina wake wabaguka muulwanda lwa Galilaya, wanhu wamsondelela. Walawa mwi izisi za Galilaya, Yudeya,
41003008	Yelusalemu, na Idumeya, na umwambu wa Yolodani, na banzi za Tilo na Sidoni. Wose wawo weza kwa Yesu kwaviya wahulika mbuli zayatendile Yesu.
41003009	Kwa ichimu wanhu wakala wengi, Yesu kawalongela wanahina wake wamtandile ngalawa muladi wanhu sekewamsung'hesung'he.
41003010	Kwa ichimu kawahonya wengi, ivo wanhu wose wakalile wogaya wakala woisung'hasung'ha wadahe kumwamha.
41003011	Na wanhu wakalile na vinyamkela chila vawamuonile Yesu, wagwa haulongozi hake, na walila kwa dizi kulu, “Weye iyo Mwana wa Mulungu!”
41003012	Mbali Yesu kawagomesa kumulongela munhu yoyose kuwa yeye yalihi.
41003013	Yesu kakwela hanhu henuke na kuwalanga wanhu woyawalondile mwenyewo, na wawo wamsondelela.
41003014	Nayo kawasagula wanhu longo dimwe na waidi, kawalanga watumigwa. Kawalongela, “Niwasagula mweye mukale na niye. Maabaho nizawatuma mkawapetele wanhu.
41003015	Na mweye mwizadaha kulava vinyamkela.”
41003016	Na wano wawo woyawasagule, Saimoni, Yesu kamwing'ha zina Petili,
41003017	Yakobo na ndugu yake Yohana, wana wa Zebedayo, wano kaweng'ha zina Boanelige, fambulo jake “Wanhu wa Ng'huwa,”
41003018	Andeleya, Filipo, Batulomayo, Masayo, Tomasi, Yakobo mwana wa Alufayo, Tadeyi, Saimoni Mkananayo,
41003019	na Yuda Isikaliyoti, yoyamuhinduke Yesu.
41003020	Maabaho Yesu kabwela ukaye. Lung'husesa lukulu lwa wanhu luiting'hana kaidi mbaka Yesu na wanahina wake hawadahile kuja.
41003021	Ndugu zake vawahulike, wahita kumsola kwaviya wanhu wakala wolonga, “Kokwingililwa!”
41003022	Na wafundiza Malagilizo walawile Yelusalemu walonga, “Kana Mwenembago! Na imkulu wa vinyamkela iyo yomtaza kuwalava vinyamkela.”
41003023	Yesu kawalanga, kawalongela simwe, “Vino Lufyende kodaha kumulava Setani?
41003024	Fana ufalume wahaigola wenyewo, ufalume uwo uzagwa.
41003025	Na ikaye yahaigolagola yenyewo, ikaye iyo izagwa.
41003026	Ivo fana ufalume wa Lufyende wahaigola wenyewo, uzagwa na kufika hauhelelo.
41003027	“Habule munhu yodaha kwingila mwiikaye ya munhu yeli na nguvu na kusola vinhu vake, mbaka yanduse kumfunga munhu iyo yali na nguvu. Maabaho kezadaha kusola vinhu vake.
41003028	“Nowalongela ukweli, wanhu wezasegezeligwa uhasanyi wawo na maligo yao yose kwa Mulungu.
41003029	Mbali yoyose yondayamulige Muhe Yelile hezasegezeligwa ng'o, kwaviya katenda uhasanyi wa siku zose.”
41003030	Yesu kalonga ivo kwa ichimu wanhu wakala wolonga, “Kana chinyamkela.”
41003031	Maabaho mami yake Yesu na wandugu zake weza Wema hanze, wamtuma munhu yakamtange Yesu.
41003032	Wanhu wengi wakala wamzunguluka. Nawo wamulongela, “Mami yake yako na wandugu zako wakunze wokuzahila.”
41003033	Yesu kawedika, “Mami yangu yalihi? Na wandugu zangu walihi?”
41003034	Maabaho kawalola wanhu wamzunguluke na kulonga, “Mami yangu na wandugu zangu iwano wabahano!
41003035	Munhu yoyose yotenda yaja yomnogeza Mulungu, iyo ndugu yangu na lumbu jangu na mami yangu.”
41004001	Yesu kandusa kufundiza kaidi mumgwazogwazo mwa lamba da Galilaya. Lung'husesa lukulu lwa wanhu lumzunguluka mbaka kengila mwiingalawa na kukala umo. Wanhu wose wakala mumgwazogwazo mwa lamba.
41004002	Kawafundiza vinhu vingi kwa masimwe. Muna yamafundizo yake kawalongela,
41004003	“Mnhegeleze, Hakala na munhu yoyohanda kahita kumiza mbeyu.
41004004	Viyakalile komiza, mbeyu zimwenga zilagalila mwiinzila, na ndege weza wazija.
41004005	Zimwenga zilagalila muna uluwe hali na ulongo chidogo. Zota hima hima kwaviya ulongo ukala chidogo.
41004006	Mbali zuwa vidilawile, diisoma minoga, na kwaviya haikalile na mizizi, inyala.
41004007	Zimwenga zilagalila hanhu hana imiwa. Imiwa ikula na kuibananga minoga hata ipotwa kulela.
41004008	Mbali zimwenga zilagalila hanhu hana udongo unogile. Minoga yota, ikula na kulela, zimwenga zilela malongo matatu, zimwenga zilela malongo masita, na zimwenga zilela gana.”
41004009	Maabaho Yesu kalonga, “Munhu yeli na magutwi, yahulike!”
41004010	Yesu viyakalile yaidumwe, wanahina wake longo dimwe na waidi wamuhitila na kumulongela yawafambulile masimwe yayo.
41004011	Yesu kawedika, “Mweye mwing'higwa kuzimanya mbuli zifisigwe za Ufalume wa Mulungu. Mbali waja weli kunze wozihulika mbuli izo kwa masimwe,
41004012	muladi, Walole, mbali sekewawone, wahulike, mbali sekewavimanye, Kwaviya wahavimanya wodaha kumbwelela Mulungu, naye kezadaha kuwasegezela uhasanyi wawo.”
41004013	Maabaho Yesu kawalongela wanahina wake, “Hamudimanyile simwe dino? Lelo muzamanyaze simwe dimwenga jojose?
41004014	Mbeyu yoihandigwe na muhandi ni mbuli ya Mulungu.
41004015	Wanhu wamwenga walinga mbeyu zilagalile mnzila. Vawahulika mbuli, Lufyende kokwiza na kusola mbuli ihandigwe mgati mmwawo.
41004016	Wamwenga walinga fana mbeyu zihandigwe muna yamabwe. Wahahulika mbuli, bahobaho woihokela kwa deng'ho.
41004017	Mbali kwaviya wabule mizizi mgati mmwawo, wokala chipindi chidogo. Wahapata magayo hebu manhesa kwa chimu cha mbuli, bahobaho wabwela kuchisogo.
41004018	Wanhu wamwenga walinga mbeyu zihandigwe muna imiwa. Wohulika mbuli,
41004019	mbali begete da ugima uno, uvwizi wa vinhu, na kulonda mbuli zimwenga, voyibebenyeka mbuli mbaka ipotwe kulela.
41004020	Mbali wanhu wamwenga walinga fana mbeyu ihandigwe muna udongo unogile. Wohulika mbuli, woitogola na wolela, wamwenga malongo matatu, wamwenga malongo masita, na wamwenga gana dimwe.”
41004021	Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Vino munhu kodaha kwingiza chitasa mnyumba maabaho kudigubika na mhishi hebu kudika muuvungu wa dikomwa? Haidahika hata chidogo. Mbali munhu kokwika chitasa hana ichingolobweda, muladi chimwemwese kose.
41004022	Kwaviya chinhu chochose chochifisigwe chizawoneka, na chinhu chochose chochigubikigwe chizagubuligwa.
41004023	Yeli na magutwi ya kuhulika, nayahulike.”
41004024	Na kawalongela, “Iteganyeni na yaja yomuyahulika! Ndagilizi zomusang'hanila kuwatagusila wamwenga, Mulungu kezazisang'hanila ndagilizi izo kuwatagusa mweye, maabaho mwizakongezeligwa.
41004025	Munhu yeli na chinhu kezakongezeligwa, na munhu yelibule chinhu welibule chinhu, kezahokigwa hata chiya chidodo chiyeli nacho.”
41004026	Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Ufalume wa Mulungu ulinga munhu yahandile mbeyu mumgunda wake.
41004027	Ichilo kogona, imisi kolamka. Mbeyu zokota na kukula, mbali yeye havimanya bule vitendeka.
41004028	Udongo wenyewo wozitenda mbeyu kukula goya na kwima matunda, teng'hu diyani maabaho mada, na kuuhelelo uhemba wokung'hunha.
41004029	Mbeyu yahakangala, munhu iyo kosola sengo na kokwandusa kusenga, kwa ichimu siku za kukangala ndiya zifika.”
41004030	Yesu kalonga kaidi, “Vino Ufalume wa Mulungu chiulinganyize na choni? Simwe dilihi donda nisang'hanile kuufambula?
41004031	Ulinga na mbeyu ya haladali yili ndodo kufosa mbeyu zose zili mwiisi.
41004032	Mbali yahahandigwa, yokula na kuwa biki kulu kufosa mibiki yose. Dokwika matambi makulu ng'hani, mbaka ndege weli kuulanga wodaha kuzenga mvulu zawo muna yamatambi yake.”
41004033	Yesu kawapetela wanhu mbuli yake kwa masimwe yamwenga fana ino, kawalongela viya viwodaha kuvimanya.
41004034	Kawalongela vose kwa masimwe mbali kakala yaidumwe na wanahina kawalongela chila chinhu funhufunhu.
41004035	Ichigulogulo cha siku ija, Yesu kawalongela wanahina wake, “Chikanhe lwanda chihite umwambu.”
41004036	Wawaleka wanhu wose weli haja, wanahina wengila mwiingalawa iyengile Yesu na wandusa kusegela. Kukala ngalawa zimwenga.
41004037	Beho kulu dilawilila na kutibula mazi, mawimbi yandusa kwingila mwiingalawa na mbaka ilonda kumema mazi.
41004038	Yesu kakala kuchisogo mwiingalawa, kagona na kadika ditwi jake mumto. Wanahina wamulamusa, wamulongela, “Mfundiza, hugesa cheye vichidanganika?”
41004039	Yesu kalamuka, kadibwakila beho na kayalongela mawimbi, “Nyamala!” Maabaho beho dikala hupi na kukala zinziwa.
41004040	Maabaho Yesu kawalongela wanahina wake, “Habali modumba? Mwabule uhuwilo mbaka sambi?”
41004041	Wanahina wadumba ng'hani, waiuzagiza, “Ino munhu waki? Hata mbeho na mawimbi vose vimtegeleza!”
41005001	Yesu na wanahina wake wafika umwambu wa dilamba da Galilaya mwiisi ya Wagelasi.
41005002	Lusita ulo ulo Yesu viyahulumuke mwiingalawa, kaiting'ha na munhu yeli na chinyamkela yoyalawile kuna ivileme kowawandigwa wanhu.
41005003	Ukazi wa munhu iyo ukala kuna ivileme, na habule munhu yadahile kumfunga kaidi, hata kwa minyololo.
41005004	Lusita lwingi wageza kumzingiliza, mbali kaidumula minyololo viwamzingilizaga muna yamakono yake na kuvibenaga-benaga vizuma viwamzingilizaga muna yamagulu yake. Habule munhu yoyadahile kumgwila.
41005005	Ichilo na imisi kakala kuna yamaleme na imigongo koguta nyangi na kuikanhakanha na mabwe.
41005006	Viyamuwonile Yesu kwa kutali, kamkimbilila na maabaho kumtumbalila mavindi.
41005007	Kaguta nyangi kwa dizi kulu, “Yesu Mwana wa Mulungu yeli Kuchanyha Ng'hani! Choni chiulonda kumwangu? Ilahe kwa zina da Mulungu kuwa hwizanhesa!”
41005008	Kalonga ivo kwaviya Yesu kamulongela, “Chinyamkela mulawe munhu ino!”
41005009	Yesu kamuuza, “Zina jako nani?” Nayo kedika, “Zina jangu Lung'husesa, kwaviya chawengi!”
41005010	Kamulamba ng'hani Yesu sekeyawawinge kunze mwa isi ija.
41005011	Kukala lung'husesa lukulu lwa nguluwe wodimigwa muna umulima.
41005012	Ivo vinyamkela wamulamba Yesu, “Uchigale kuzinguluwe, na uchilekelele chiwengile wawo.”
41005013	Yesu kawatogolela, ivo vinyamkela wamulawa munhu ija na wengila mwiizinguluwe. Lung'husesa lose lwa nguluwe malongo magana maidi wakimbilila mudilamba, na wadumbukila muna yamazi wadanganika.
41005014	Wadimi wa zinguluwe wakimbila na kuzipwililisa mbuli izo muyamabululu na mwiimigunda. Wanhu wahita kulola yalawilile.
41005015	Viwafikile kwa Yesu, wamuwona munhu ija yoyakalile na lung'husesa lwa vinyamkela kakala hasi, kayawala viwalo goya na hakili zake zimbwelela. Wanhu wose wadumba.
41005016	Wanhu wowawonile dilawilile, wawalongela wamwenga yaja yampatile munhu ija yoyakalile na vinyamkela na mbuli za nguluwe.
41005017	Maabaho wanhu wamulamba Yesu yasegele mwiisi yawo.
41005018	Yesu viyakalile kokwela mwiingalawa, munhu ija yoyakalile na vinyamkela kamulamba wahite wose.
41005019	Mbali Yesu kalemela, kamulongela, “Hita ukaye kwa ndugu zako ukawalongele yaja yose Mndewa yoyakutendele na viyakuwonele ubazi.”
41005020	Ivo munhu iyo kasegela na kuhita uko Dekapoli, kawalongela yaja yose Yesu yoyamtendele. Wanhu wose wowahulike wazanywa.
41005021	Yesu kabwela umwambu wa dilamba. Lung'husesa lukulu lwa wanhu lummemela mumgwazogwazo mwa dilamba.
41005022	Maabaho keza munhu imwe mkulu wa kaye ya kutosela zina jake Yailo. Viyamuwonile Yesu, kaibwanha hasi muyamagulu yake,
41005023	kampula, “Mndele wangu ni mtamu ng'hani. Nokulamba wize ukamwikile makono yapate kuhona.”
41005024	Maabaho Yesu kahita hamwe na Yailo. Lung'husesa lukulu lwa wanhu lumsondelela na kumsung'ha-sung'ha.
41005025	Baho kukala na mwanamke imwe yoyakalile na utamu wa kulawa damu kwa miyaka longo na midi.
41005026	Mwanamke iyo kagaya ng'hani kuwahitila waganga wengi na kasang'hanila vinhu vake vose, hapatile muhavu mbali hali yake igendelela kwiha.
41005027	Viyahulike mbuli za Yesu, kafosa mgati muulung'husesa, kamsondelela Yesu kuchisogo na kudalisa walo jake,
41005028	kailongela mwenyewo, “Nihadalisa walo jake muhala, nizahona.”
41005029	Viyamhile walo da Yesu, bahobaho damu ileka kumulawa, nayo kaihulika kuwa kahona.
41005030	Bahobaho Yesu kavimanya kuwa udaho umulawa. Basi kaluhindukila lung'husesa lwa wanhu na kuluuza, “Yelihi yoyadalise walo jangu?”
41005031	Wanahina wake wamwidika, “Kowona wanhu viwokusung'ha-sung'ha, maabaho weye kouza yelihi yoyakudalise?”
41005032	Mbali Yesu kalola banzi zose muladi yamuwone yoyatendile ivo.
41005033	Mwanamke ija kachimanya chinhu chochimulawilile, ivo kamuhitila Yesu kuno kodumba na kugudemeka. Kamtumbalila mavindi na kamulongela ukweli wose.
41005034	Yesu kamulongela, “Mwanangu, uhuwilo wako ukuhonyeza. Hita kwa tindiwalo, na utamu wako uhona.”
41005035	Lusita ulo Yesu viyakalile kolonga, wanhu wamwenga weza kulawa ukaye kwa Yailo, ija mkulu wa kaye ya kutosela na wamulongela, “Mndele wako kadanganika. Habali kogendelela kumgaza mfundiza?”
41005036	Yesu viyahulike mbuli zilongigwe na wanhu wawo, kazeha, kamulongela mkulu wa kaye ya kutosela, “Sekeudumbe, togola tu.”
41005037	Maabaho Yesu halondile munhu yoyose yamsondelele, ila Petili na Yakobo na Yohana, ndugu yake Yakobo.
41005038	Viwafikile mwiikaye ya mkulu wa kaye ya kutosela yatangigwe Yailo, Yesu kawona tibwilitibwili na kahulika nyangi na ndilo.
41005039	Yesu kengila mnyumba na kuwalongela, “Habali motenda tibwilitibwili na kulila? Mndele hadanganike bule, kagona tu!”
41005040	Mbali wamseka, ivo Yesu kawasegeza wose kunze, kamsola tati yake ija imwana na mamiyake yake na waja wanahina watatu, wengila mumsana muyatambalisigwe imndele.
41005041	Kamwamha mkono na kumulongela, “Talita, koumu!” Fambulo jake, “Mndele, nokulongela lamka!”
41005042	Bahobaho mndele ija kenuka na kandusa kugenda. Mndele iyo kakala na miyaka longo na midi. Chinhu icho vichilawilile, wanhu wazanywa ng'hani.
41005043	Mbali Yesu kawagomesa ng'hani sekewamulongele munhu yoyose mbuli ija, maabaho kawalongela, “Mwing'heni ndiya mndele ino.”
41006001	Yesu kasegela baho, kahita kudibululu jake na wanahina wake wamsondelela.
41006002	Isiku ya Mhumulo viifikile, kandusa kufundiza mwiikaye ya kutosela. Wanhu wowamuhulike wazanywa. Wauza, “Vino kazipatahi mbuli zino?” Viya ubala waki woyeng'higwe ino mbaka yatende mauzauza yano?
41006003	Viya ino siyo ija msongola vinhu? Mwana wa Maliya, ndugu yawo Yakobo na Yose na Yuda na Saimoni. Vino walumbu zake si wokala baha hamwetu? Ivo hawamtogole bule.
41006004	Yesu kawalongela, “Mulotezi wa Mulungu kohishimigwa chila hanhu, kasolo mwiisi yake mwenyewo, na kwa ndugu zake na kwa wanhu wa ulukolo lwake mwenyewo.”
41006005	Yesu hadahile kutenda mauzauza yoyose, ila kawekila makono watamu wadodo na kuwahonyeza.
41006006	Kazanywa ng'hani kwaviya wanhu wakala wabule uhuwilo. Amalabaho Yesu kahita mwi ivibululu vili habehi, kafundiza wanhu.
41006007	Yesu kawatanga wanahina longo na waidi, kawatuma waidiwaidi, kaweng'ha udaho wa kuwinga vinyamkela.
41006008	Kawalongela, “Mwahahita, sekemusole chinhu, kasolo mhome muhala. Sekemusole gate na chigelo na hela mwichibindo.
41006009	Valeni vilatu, mbali sekemsole viwalo vimwenga.
41006010	Hanhu hohose honda muhokelwe, mukale umo mbaka vondamusegele.
41006011	Na hanhu hohose hawamuhokeleni hebu kuwategeleza, segeleni hanhu baho, na kung'huneni matimbwisi yeli muna yamagulu yenu, kulagusa chilaguso cha kuwakanya.”
41006012	Ivo wasegela na kuwapetela wanhu waleke uhasanyi wawo.
41006013	Wawalava vinyamkela wengi, na wawaboboda mavuta wanhu wengi wowakalile watamu na kuwahonyeza.
41006014	Mfalume Helode kahulika zimbuli izo, chimu nhogolwa za Yesu zenela chila hanhu. Wanhu wakala wolonga, “Yohana Mbatizi kazilibuka! Icho ichimu lekamana kana ludabwa lwa kusang'hana mauzauza.”
41006015	Wamwenga walonga, “Iyo ni Eliya.” Na wamwenga walonga, “Iyo ni mulotezi wa Mulungu yalingane na walagula wa umwaka.”
41006016	Mbali Helode viyahulike ivo, kalonga, “Ino niiyo Yohana Mbatizi inimkanhile iditwi kazilibuka kulawa mwiifa!”
41006017	Kwaviya Helode mwenyewo kakala kalagiliza Yohana yagwiligwe na yekigwe mwiichifungo. Katenda ivo kwaviya kamsola Helodiya, yoyakalile mke wa Filipo, sekulu wa Helode.
41006018	Yohana Mbatizi kakala komulongela Helode, Malagilizo yolonga, “Havilondeka bule weye kumsola mke wa sekulu wako.”
41006019	Ivo Helodiya kakala komwihila Yohana, na kakala kalonda kumkoma. Mbali hadahile bule kwa ichimu cha Helode.
41006020	Helode kakala komdumba Yohana kwaviya kavimanya Yohana kakala munhu yanogile na yelile, ivo kakala komkaliza. Kakala konogelwa kumtegeleza, ingawa kakala konyululuka ng'hani chila viyamalile kumtegeleza.
41006021	Siku dimwe, nyafasi ipatigwa viikalile mwiisiku ya kukumbuka kuvumbuka kwa Helode. Helode kakala kawatendela dugila kulu wakulu wa bululu na wakulu wa wakalizi na walangulizi wa Galilaya.
41006022	Mndele wa Helodiya viyengile kuvina, kawanogeza ng'hani Helode na wageni wake. Ivo Helode kamulongela mndele ija, “Nipule chinhu chochose chiulonda, nizakwing'ha.”
41006023	Kalonga kwa kuilaha, “Noilaha, chochose chonda unipule nizakwing'ha, hata nusu ya ufalume wangu!”
41006024	Ivo mndele ija kahita kumuuza mamiyake yake, “Nipule choni?” Mamiyake kamwidika, “Pula ditwi da Yohana Mbatizi.”
41006025	Bahobaho mndele ija kakimbila mbaka kwa mfalume na kumulongela, “Ning'he sambi baha ditwi da Yohana Mbatizi muna ichano!”
41006026	Mfalume kengilwa na chinyala ng'hani, mbali kwaviya kailaha haulongozi ha wageni wake hana didugila, hadahile kumulemela bule.
41006027	Lusita ulo ulo, mfalume kamulagiliza mkalizi kudigala ditwi da Yohana. Mkalizi kahita kuna ichifungo na kumkanha Yohana iditwi.
41006028	Maabaho keka ditwi ijo muna ichano, kamgalila mndele ija, nayo kamwing'ha mami yake.
41006029	Wanahina wa Yohana viwahulike mbuli iyo, wahita kuusola mtufi wa Yohana, wauwanda.
41006030	Watumigwa wabwela, waiting'hana na Yesu na kumulongela yaja yose yowatendile na kufundiza.
41006031	Kukala na wanhu wengi wowakalile wokwiza na kusegela, mbaka Yesu na wanahina wake hawapatile bule nyafasi ya kuja ndiya. Ivo kawalongela, “Chiteni chiidumwe hanhu helibule wanhu muladi mukahumule chidogo.”
41006032	Ivo wasegela waidumwe kwa ngalawa, wahita hanhu helibule wanhu.
41006033	Mbali wanhu wowaonile viwakalile wosegela, wavimanya. Ivo wahita kulawa mabululu yose, wakimbila na wawalongolela kufika Yesu na wanahina wake.
41006034	Yesu viyahulumuke kulawa mwiingalawa, kaluwona lung'husesa lukulu lwa wanhu. Kawaonela ubazi kwaviya wakala fana ng'hondolo welibule wadimi. Ivo kandusa kuwafundiza vinhu vingi.
41006035	Viifikile chigulogulo, wanahina wake wamuhitila na wamulongela, “Hanhu hano hochili ni chuwala muhala, na sambi diswa.
41006036	Walekelele wanhu wahite muna imigunda na muna yamabululu yeli habehi muladi wakagule ndiya waje.”
41006037	Yesu kawedika, “Mweye weng'heni ndiya waje.” Wamuuza, “Vino chihite chikagule magate ya hela nyingi ng'hani chiweng'he waje?”
41006038	Yesu kawauza, “Munayo magate mengahi? Hiteni mkalole.” Viwavimanyile, wamulongela. “Kuna magate matano na somba waidi.”
41006039	Maabaho Yesu kawalongela wanahina wake wawalongele wanhu wose waigole mwiivibumbila-bumbila, wakale hasi hana yamasavu mabisi.
41006040	Ivo wakala mwiivibumbila va wanhu gana-gana na va wanhu malongo matano-matano.
41006041	Maabaho Yesu kayasola yaja yamagate matano na somba waidi, kalola kuchanyha kuulanga na kumwing'ha Mulungu hewela. Maabaho kayamogola yamagate yaja, kaweng'ha wanahina wake wawagolele wanhu. Viyaviya kawagolela wose waja somba waidi.
41006042	Wanhu wose waja na weguta.
41006043	Wanahina wake wadondola yaja yamasigavu ya magate na somba na kumemeza vigelo longo na vidi.
41006044	Walume muhala wadile wakala magana malongo matano.
41006045	Bahobaho Yesu kawalagiliza wanahina wake wakwele mwiingalawa wahite Besisaida. Yeye kakala kolulaga lung'husesa lwa wanhu wasegele.
41006046	Viyakomeleze kuwalaga wanhu, kahita kumulima kutosa.
41006047	Viifikile chigulogulo, ngalawa ikala mgati mudilamba, mbali Yesu kakala yaidumwe mwiisi inyalile.
41006048	Kawawona wanahina wake wogayagaya kutowa zing'hafi, kwaviya beho kulu dikala dowabweleza kuwalawile. Nzogolo zikwika, Yesu kawahitila kuno kogenda mchanyha ya mazi. Kalonda kuwafosa,
41006049	mbali viwamuwonile kogenda mchanyha ya mazi, wagesa mzimu. Waguta ng'hondo.
41006050	Wose viwamuwone wadumba ng'hani. Bahobaho Yesu kawalongela, “Ing'heni moyo! Ni niye! Sekemdumbe.”
41006051	Maabaho kakwela mwiingalawa muweli wanahina wake, na beho dinyamala hupi. Wanahina wazanywa ng'hani,
41006052	kwaviya hawavimanyile bule imbuli ya kwing'higwa ndiya lung'husesa lukulu lwa wanhu, mizoyo yawo ikala midala kuvimanya.
41006053	Viwamalile kukanha dilamba, wafika isi ya Genesaleti, baho waimiza ngalawa yawo.
41006054	Bahobaho viwalawile mwiingalawa, wanhu wammanya Yesu.
41006055	Ivo wanhu wapwililisa mwiisi ija yose, wandusa kuwasola watamu muna yamakomwa na kuwagala hohose howahulike Yesu kabaho.
41006056	Hanhu hohose haja Yesu hayahitile, muimigunda hebu muna yamabululu hebu mwiiziisi, wanhu waweka watamu muna yamagulilo. Wamulamba yawalekelele wadalise hata muna imhindo ya walo jake. Wose wowadidalise wahona.
41007001	Mafalisayo na wafundiza wa Malagilizo walawa Yelusalemu, waiting'hana haulongozi ha Yesu.
41007002	Wawawona wanahina wake wamwenga woja ndiya kuno makono hayanawigwe, hawanawile makono fana Mafalisayo viwolonda wanhu wanawe.
41007003	Mafalisayo na Wayahudi wose wakala wamhilila malagilizo ya wasaho zawo. Wakala hawaja chinhu wang'hali hawana nawa makono mbaka muiching'ho.
41007004	Kaidi hawaja chinhu chilawile kudisoko mbaka wachisunhe teng'hu. Iviya yauko mafundizo yamwenga wayahokela kulawa umwaka fana viya kusunha nhungo na ziga na viyaa va shaba.
41007005	Ivo waja Mafalisayo na wafundiza wa Malagilizo wamuuza Yesu, “Habali wanahina wako hawawinza mafundizo yochihokele kwa wasaho zetu? Habali woja ndiya kwa makono hayasunhigwe?”
41007006	Yesu kawedika, “Mweye wadelenya! Mulagula Isaya kalagula vinogile kumwenu vayalongile, ‘Wanhu wano wonhogoza kwa milomo yawo, mbali mizoyo yawo yakutali na niye.
41007007	Wonitambikila bule kwaviya wofundiza Malagilizo ya wanhu fana viya ni malagilizo ya Mulungu!’
41007008	“Mweye moleka malagilizo ya Mulungu, mowinza mafundizo ya wanhu.”
41007009	Yesu kagendelela kuwalongela, “Moyalema malagilizo ya Mulungu muladi muwinze mafundizo ya wanhu.
41007010	Musa kalagiliza, ‘Wategeleze tati yako na mamiyake yako.’ Iviya kalagiliza, ‘Munhu yoyose yonda yamulige tati yake hebu mamiyake yake yakomigwe.’
41007011	Mbali mweye mofundiza vino, fana munhu kana chinhu cha kumwing'ha tati yake hebu mami yake, mbali kalonga, ‘Chino ni Kolibani,’ fambulo jake, chinhu chino ni cha kumwing'ha Mulungu,
41007012	maabaho molonga munhu iyo halondigwa kumwing'ha tati yake hebu mami yake.
41007013	Ivo vimuibena mbuli ya Mulungu kwa mafundizo yomuihokeleza. Iviya motenda vinhu vingi vifanile na ivo.”
41007014	Maabaho Yesu kalutanga kaidi ulung'husesa lwa wanhu na kalulongela, “Nhegelezeni mose na muvimanye.
41007015	Habule chinhu chochimwingila munhu kulawa kunze chichidaha kumtenda yambule mwiko. Mbali chiya chochilawa mgati mwa munhu niicho chichidaha kumtenda yambule mwiko.”
41007016	Munhu yahawa na magutwi nayahulike.
41007017	Viyalulekile ulung'husesa lwa wanhu, kengila mnyumba, wanahina wake wamulongela yawafambulile simwe diya.
41007018	Yesu kawalongela, “Vino mweye iviya mwabule hakili? Hamuvimanyile bule? Habule chinhu chochimwingila munhu kulawa kunze chochimtenda yambule mwiko.
41007019	Kwaviya hachingila muumoyo mbali chokwingila mmunda, maabaho cholawa kunze ya lukuli.” Viyalongile ivo, Yesu kazitogola ndiya zose kudigwa.
41007020	Kagendelela kulonga, “Chiya chochilawa muumoyo wa munhu, icho chimtenda munhu yambule mwiko.
41007021	Kwaviya muumoyo wa munhu molawa magesa yehile na ugoni na ubavi na kukoma na kuigona na wihi
41007022	na ugoni na uvwizi na uziya na kulola vinhu chiwihi na maligo na magoda na ubozi.
41007023	Vino vose vihile volawa mgati muumoyo wa munhu, navo niivo mwambula mwiko munhu.”
41007024	Maabaho Yesu kasegela, baho kahita mwiisi yili habehi na dibulu da Tilo. Uko kengila mnyumba na halondile munhu yoyose yavimanye kuwa kahaja, mbali hadahile bule kuifisa.
41007025	Mwanamke imwe yoyakalile na mwana mndele yeli na chinyamkela kahulika mbuli za Yesu. Ivo bahobaho kamuhitila na kaibwanha muna yamagulu yake.
41007026	Mwanamke iyo kakala Muyunani, yalekigwe mudibululu da Silofoinike uko Siliya. Kampula Yesu yamulave mndele wake chinyamkela.
41007027	Yesu kamulongela, “Waleke wana teng'hu weguta. Kwaviya havinogile bule kusola ndiya ya wana na kuzasila zimbwa.”
41007028	Mwanamke ija kedika, “Mndewa, mbali hata zimbwa zozikalile hasi ha imeza zoja ndiya za wana zozisigale!”
41007029	Yesu kamulongela mwanamke ija, “Kwa ivo vowidike, hita ukaye, na kwizamfika chinyamkela kamulawa mndele wako!”
41007030	Ivo kahita ukaye kumwake, kamfika mwanage katambalala mudikomwa, chinyamkela kakala kamulawa.
41007031	Maabaho Yesu kasegela isi ya Tilo na kahita mudilamba da Galilaya kufosela Sidoni na mwiisi ya Dekapoli.
41007032	Wanhu wamwenga wamgalila munhu yoyakalile chinziwi na yeli na ludanha, wamulamba Yesu yamwikile makono munhu iyo.
41007033	Ivo Yesu kamsola munhu iyo hamgwazo helibule wanhu. Kaguma vidole vake muna yamagutwi ya munhu iyo. Maabaho katema yamate na kumdalisa lulimi.
41007034	Maabaho Yesu kalola kuulanga, kabweleza umuhe na kumulongelela munhu iyo, “Efata!” Fambulo jake, “Vuguka!”
41007035	Bahobaho munhu iyo kandusa kuhulika na ludanha lwa lulimi lwake lulegela, kandusa kulonga goya.
41007036	Maabaho Yesu kawagomesa kumulongela munhu yoyose mbuli ino. Mbali vayagendelele kuwagomesa, niivo vawagendelele kuipwililisa mbuli iyo.
41007037	Wanhu wazanywa ng'hani, walonga, “Katenda yose vinogile. Kawatenda vinziwi wahulike na mabubu walonge!”
41008001	Siku dimwe lung'husesa lumwenga lukulu lwa wanhu luiting'hana kaidi. Wanhu viwakalile wabule ndiya, Yesu kawatanga wanahina wake na kuwalongela,

41008020	Kawauza kaidi, “Na vinimogole yaja yamagate saba na kuweng'ha wanhu magana malongo mane, mudondola vigelo vingahi va masigavu?” Wamwidika, “Chidondola vigelo saba.”
41008021	Yesu kawauza, “Mung'hali hamunavimanya?”
41008022	Wafika mudibululu da Besisaida, wanhu wemwenga wamgalila Yesu munhu chipofu na wamulamba yandalise.

41008025	Yesu kamwikila kaidi makono muna yameso. Maabaho meso yake yavuguka, nayo kawa mgima, na kawona vinhu vose funhufunhu.

41009001	Iviya Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela kweli, wanhu wamwenga weli hano hawezadanganika mbaka wauwone Ufalume wa Mulungu wokwiza kwa ludabwa.”

41009043	One mkono wako uhakutenda utende yehile, uukanhe. Muhavu wingile muna ugima wa siku zose na mkono umwe muhala, kufosa kwingila na makono maidi jehanamu. Uko moto wake hauzimika bule.
